entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:19 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:19 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
